Package avrora.sim.radio.freespace

Class Summary
Distance stores the between a node and the node who own radio
FreeSpaceAir Implementation of the free space radio propagation model
LocalAirImpl Implementation of Local Air
Position Represents a three dim. position
Topology handles node positions.
